text: Kathleen Wendy Herald Peyton (born 2 August 1929 in Birmingham, England, died 19 December 2023) was an English writer. She wrote over 50 books, including Blind Beauty (1999) and Stealaway (2001). == Other websites == * About KM Peyton * Reviews of some of KM Peyton's books and series Category:1929 births Category:2023 deaths Category:English children's writers Category:English novelists Category:Members of the Order of the British Empire Category:Writers from Birmingham
title: K.M. Peyton
